```{r}

variance <- function(x, na.rm = TRUE) {
  n <- length(x)
  m <- mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
  err2 <- (x - m)^2
  sum(err2) / (n - 1)
  
}


x=c(1,2,3,4)

variance(x)
```

1.3.b


```{r}

skewness <- function(x, na.rm = FALSE) {
  n <- length(x)
  m <- mean(x, na.rm = na.rm)
  v <- var(x, na.rm = na.rm)
  (sum((x - m) ^ 3) / (n - 2)) / v ^ (3 / 2)
}


x=c(1,2,3,4,8)

skewness(x)

```
